'''Deserted Ruins of Thermadon''' is a [[Quest Domain]] during {{Quest|Treacherous Thermadon}}.

[[Royce]] can be encountered here.

==Soundtracks==
{{Soundtracks by Category Table|type=domain}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* The domain was likely named after the Thermodon, the Greek name for the {{w|Terme River}} in Turkey. In Greek mythology this was the location of the plain and capital of Themyscira, home of the Amazons.
